WELCOME TO MINESWEEPER
How to play the game
1. Define the size(height annd width) of the board, minimum is 2X2, maxium is 5x5, and it has to be a whole number value.
2. Define the number of bombs minimum is 1, maximum is number of tiles minus 1, and it has to be a whole number value.
3. Start uncovering tiles you think have no bombs(write the coordinates of tile you want to uncover in format X,Y).
4. When only the uncovered tiles are the ones with the bombs, you've won:
EXTRA HINTS
-if you click the tile and it has a bomb, it's game over.
-if the tile has no bomb, then it shows the number of bombs that are surrounding the clicked tile
